src:
Hasil Kualifikasi F1 GP AS 2019: Bottas Pole, Hamilton Kelima
03 Nov 2019, 05:35 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Valtteri Bottas raih pole positiion F1 GP Amerika Serikat (AS) 2019. (Toshifumi KITAMURA / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pebalap Mercedes Valtteri Bottas meraih pole position GP Formula 1 Amerika Serikat (AS) 2019 usai mencatat waktu tercepat di Sirkuit Austin, Sabtu (2/11) waktu setempat.Ini menjadi pole kelima Bottas di sepanjang F1 2019. Pebalap asal Finlandia itu berhasil mencatat waktu terbaik 1 menit 32,029 detik atau unggul 0,012 detik dari Sebastian Vettel (Ferrari) yang berada di urutan kedua.Sementara posisi ketiga dan keempat masing-masing ditempati Max Verstappen (Red Bull) dan Charles Leclerc (Ferrari). Sedanngkan rekan setim Bottas, Lewis Hamilton, harus puas start di urutan kelima.Meski demikian, Hamilton hanya perlu finis kedelapan jika Bottas mampu mengunci podium pertama di Sirkuit Americas. Saat ini, Hamilton unggul 74 angka dari Bottas yang ada di posisi kedua klasemen dengan 289 poin.Selain berpeluang meraih gelar keenam, Hamilton juga berpotensi melewati rekor kemenangan terbanyak dalam satu musim F1. Pria asal Inggris itu sudah 10 kali menjejak podium tertinggi di sepanjang musim 2019.Seri ke-19 F1 2019 akan digelar di Sirkuit Austin atau Americas pada Minggu waktu setempat ataw Senin pukul 02.10 WIB. Dua seri tersisa bakal dihelat di Brasil dan Abu Dhabi.Hasil Kualifikasi F1 GP Amerika Serikat:1. Valtteri Bottas (Mercedes): 1 menit 32,029 detik2. Sebastian Vettel (Ferrari): +0,012 detik3. Max Verstappen (Red Bull): +0,067 detik4. Charles Leclerc (Ferrari): +0,108 detik5. Lewis Hamilton (Mercedes): +0,292 detik6. Alexander Albon (Red Bull): +0,519 detik7. Carlos Sainz (McLaren): +0,818 detik8. Lando Norris (McLaren): +1,146 detik9. Daniel Ricciardo (Renault): +1,459 detik10. Pierre Gasly (Toro Rosso): +1,572 detik (jun)
text:
US F1 F1 GP Qualification Results 2019: Bottas Pole, Fifth Hamilton
03 Nov 2019, 05:35 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Valtteri Bottas won pole position F1 F1 United States (US) 2019. (Toshifumi KITAMURA / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Mercedes racer Valtteri Bottas won the 2019 GP Formula 1 United States (US) pole position after recording the fastest time at the Austin Circuit on Saturday (2/11) local time. It became the fifth Bottas pole along F1 2019. The rider from Finland it managed to record the best time of 1 minute 32.029 seconds or 0.012 seconds ahead of Sebastian Vettel (Ferrari) who was in second place. While the third and fourth positions were respectively occupied by Max Verstappen (Red Bull) and Charles Leclerc (Ferrari). Meanwhile Bottas' teammate, Lewis Hamilton, had to settle for starting fifth. Even so, Hamilton only needed to finish eighth if Bottas was able to lock the first podium at the Americas Circuit. Currently, Hamilton is 74 points ahead of Bottas who is second in the standings with 289 points. In addition to winning the sixth title, Hamilton also has the potential to pass the record for most wins in an F1 season. The man from England has already set the highest podium 10 times throughout the 2019 season. The 1919 F1 2019 series will be held at the Austin or Americas Circuit on Sunday local time or on Monday at 10:10 WIB. The remaining two series will be held in Brazil and Abu Dhabi. United States F1 GP Qualification Results: 1. Valtteri Bottas (Mercedes): 1 minute 32.029 seconds. Sebastian Vettel (Ferrari): +0,012 seconds3. Max Verstappen (Red Bull): +0.067 seconds4. Charles Leclerc (Ferrari): +0,108 seconds5. Lewis Hamilton (Mercedes): +0,292 seconds6. Alexander Albon (Red Bull): +0,519 seconds7. Carlos Sainz (McLaren): +0,818 seconds8. Lando Norris (McLaren): +1,146 seconds9. Daniel Ricciardo (Renault): +1,459 seconds10. Pierre Gasly (Toro Rosso): +1,572 seconds (jun)
